com.ep.ggs.API.player

Class PlayerBanRequestEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ep.ggs.API.Event
      • com.ep.ggs.API.player.PlayerEvent
        • com.ep.ggs.API.player.PlayerBanRequestEvent

  • public class PlayerBanRequestEvent
extends PlayerEvent
    This event is for ban plugins that will handle ban requests from the core. If no plugin is handling bans, then a player will not be banned

    • Constructor Summary
